help.title: Support module help
help.description:
`support` 
Get the info 

`support role` 
Get all support roles 

`support role add <Role>` 
Add a new support role! 

`support role remove <Role>` 
Remove a support role! 

`support chat` 
Get all support chats 

`support chat add <Chat>` 
Add a new support chat! 

`support chat remove <Chat>` 
Remove a support chat! 

`support notification` 
Get all support notification chats 

`support notification add <Chat>` 
Add a new support notification chat! 

`support notification remove <Chat>` 
Remove a support notification chat!

role.usage: Wrong usage of `role`. Use `module SupportModule` to see the help!

chat.usage: Wrong usage of `chat`. Use `module SupportModule` to see the help!

notifications.usage: Wrong usage of `notification`. Use `module SupportModule` to see the help!
